verses.verse: And <WG2532> I, <WG1473> brethren, <WG80> could <WG1410> not <WG3756> speak <WG2980> unto you <WG5213> as <WG5613> unto spiritual, <WG4152> but <WG235> as <WG5613> unto carnal, <WG4559> even as <WG5613> unto babes <WG3516> in <WG1722> Christ. <WG5547>

I have fed <WG4222> you <WG5209> with milk, <WG1051> and <WG2532> not <WG3756> with meat: <WG1033> for <WG1063> hitherto ye were not able <WG3768> <WG1410> to bear it, <WG235> neither <WG3777> yet <WG2089> now <WG3568> are ye able. <WG1410>

For <WG1063> ye are <WG2075> yet <WG2089> carnal: <WG4559> for <WG1063> whereas <WG3699> there is among <WG1722> you <WG5213> envying, <WG2205> and <WG2532> strife, <WG2054> and <WG2532> divisions, <WG1370> are <WG2075> ye not <WG3780> carnal, <WG4559> and <WG2532> walk <WG4043> as <WG2596> men? <WG444>

For <WG1063> while <WG3752> one <WG5100> saith, <WG3004> I <WG1473> <WG3303> am <WG1510> of Paul; <WG3972> and <WG1161> another, <WG2087> I <WG1473> am of Apollos; <WG625> are <WG2075> ye not <WG3780> carnal? <WG4559>

Who <WG5101> then <WG3767> is <WG2076> Paul, <WG3972> and <WG1161> who <WG5101> is Apollos, <WG625> but <WG235> <WG2228> ministers <WG1249> by <WG1223> whom <WG3739> ye believed, <WG4100> even <WG2532> as <WG5613> the <WG3588> Lord <WG2962> gave <WG1325> to every man? <WG1538>
I <WG1473> have planted, <WG5452> Apollos <WG625> watered; <WG4222> but <WG235> God <WG2316> gave the increase. <WG837>
So then <WG5620> neither <WG3777> is <WG2076> he that planteth <WG5452> any thing, <WG5100> neither <WG3777> he that watereth; <WG4222> but <WG235> God <WG2316> that giveth the increase. <WG837>

Now <WG1161> he that planteth <WG5452> and <WG2532> he that watereth <WG4222> are <WG1526> one: <WG1520> and <WG1161> every man <WG1538> shall receive <WG2983> his own <WG2398> reward <WG3408> according <WG2596> to his own <WG2398> labor. <WG2873>
For <WG1063> we are <WG2070> laborers together with <WG4904> God: <WG2316> ye are <WG2075> God's <WG2316> husbandry, <WG1091> ye are God's <WG2316> building. <WG3619>

According <WG2596> to the <WG3588> grace <WG5485> of God <WG2316> which is given <WG1325> unto me, <WG3427> as <WG5613> a wise <WG4680> masterbuilder, <WG753> I have laid <WG5087> the foundation, <WG2310> and <WG1161> another <WG243> buildeth thereon. <WG2026> But <WG1161> let every man <WG1538> take heed <WG991> how <WG4459> he buildeth thereupon. <WG2026>
For <WG1063> other <WG243> foundation <WG2310> can <WG1410> no man <WG3762> lay <WG5087> than <WG3844> that is laid, <WG2749> which <WG3739> is <WG2076> Jesus <WG2424> Christ. <WG5547>

Now <WG1161> if any man <WG1536> build <WG2026> upon <WG1909> this <WG5126> foundation <WG2310> gold, <WG5557> silver, <WG696> precious <WG5093> stones, <WG3037> wood, <WG3586> hay, <WG5528> stubble; <WG2562>

Every man's <WG1538> work <WG2041> shall be made <WG1096> manifest: <WG5318> for <WG1063> the <WG3588> day <WG2250> shall declare <WG1213> it, because <WG3754> it shall be revealed <WG601> by <WG1722> fire; <WG4442> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> fire <WG4442> shall try <WG1381> every man's <WG1538> work <WG2041> of what sort <WG3697> it is. <WG2076>
If any man's <WG1536> work <WG2041> abide <WG3306> which <WG3739> he hath built thereupon, <WG2026> he shall receive <WG2983> a reward. <WG3408>

If any man's <WG1536> work <WG2041> shall be burned, <WG2618> he shall suffer loss: <WG2210> but <WG1161> he <WG848> himself shall be saved; <WG4982> yet <WG1161> so <WG3779> as <WG5613> by <WG1223> fire. <WG4442>

Know <WG1492> ye not <WG3756> that <WG3754> ye are <WG2075> the temple <WG3485> of God, <WG2316> and <WG2532> that the <WG3588> Spirit <WG4151> of God <WG2316> dwelleth <WG3611> in <WG1722> you? <WG5213>

If any man <WG1536> defile <WG5351> the <WG3588> temple <WG3485> of God, <WG2316> him <WG5126> shall God <WG2316> destroy; <WG5351> for <WG1063> the <WG3588> temple <WG3485> of God <WG2316> is <WG2076> holy, <WG40> which <WG3748> temple ye <WG5210> are. <WG2075>

Let no man <WG3367> deceive <WG1818> himself. <WG1438> If any man <WG1536> among <WG1722> you <WG5213> seemeth <WG1380> to be <WG1511> wise <WG4680> in <WG1722> this <WG5129> world, <WG165> let him become <WG1096> a fool, <WG3474> that <WG2443> he may be <WG1096> wise. <WG4680>

For <WG1063> the <WG3588> wisdom <WG4678> of this <WG5127> world <WG2889> is <WG2076> foolishness <WG3472> with <WG3844> God. <WG2316> For <WG1063> it is written, <WG1125> He taketh <WG1405> the <WG3588> wise <WG4680> in <WG1722> their own <WG848> craftiness. <WG3834>
And <WG2532> again, <WG3825> The Lord <WG2962> knoweth <WG1097> the <WG3588> thoughts <WG1261> of the <WG3588> wise, <WG4680> that <WG3754> they are <WG1526> vain. <WG3152>
Therefore <WG5620> let no man <WG3367> glory <WG2744> in <WG1722> men. <WG444> For <WG1063> all things <WG3956> are <WG2076> yours; <WG5216>

Whether <WG1535> Paul, <WG3972> or <WG1535> Apollos, <WG625> or <WG1535> Cephas, <WG2786> or <WG1535> the world, <WG2889> or <WG1535> life, <WG2222> or <WG1535> death, <WG2288> or <WG1535> things present, <WG1764> or <WG1535> things to come; <WG3195> all <WG3956> are <WG2076> yours; <WG5216>
And <WG1161> ye <WG5210> are Christ's; <WG5547> and <WG1161> Christ <WG5547> is God's. <WG2316>
